question: Which genes predict resistance to Olaparib or Afimoxifene in Malignant Tumor Of The Breast?
gold_cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t.name) = toLower('Olaparib')
  OR toLower(t.name) = toLower('Afimoxifene')
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Olaparib'))
  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Afimoxifene'))
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Olaparib')
  OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('Afimoxifene')
)
AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'breast'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  'resistance' AS effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids
LIMIT 100

question: List therapies targeting TOP1 (not PTK6) with evidence in Carcinoma Of Colon.
gold_cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(gi:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gi.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gi.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('PTK6')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PTK6'))
WITH t, gi, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'colon' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'carcinoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
RETURN
  CASE WHEN b:Variant THEN b.name ELSE NULL END AS variant_name,
  CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids
LIMIT 100
generated_cypher:
MATCH (t:Therapy)-[:TARGETS]->(g_target:Gene)
WHERE toLower(g_target.symbol) = toLower('TOP1')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(g_target.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('TOP1'))
OPTIONAL MATCH (t)-[:TARGETS]->(gx:Gene)
WHERE toLower(gx.symbol) = toLower('PTK6')
   OR any(s IN coalesce(gx.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('PTK6'))
WITH t, g_target, gx
WHERE gx IS NULL
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t)
WHERE (b:Gene AND b.hgnc_id = g_target.hgnc_id)
   OR (b:Variant AND EXISTS { (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g_target) })
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('colon')
AND toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS toLower('carcinoma')
WITH
  g_target.symbol AS gene_symbol,
  t.name AS therapy_name,
  rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
  rel.effect AS effect,
  coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids_list
UNWIND pmids_list AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, disease_name, effect, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids_aggregated
RETURN
  NULL AS variant_name,
  gene_symbol,
  therapy_name,
  effect,
  disease_name,
  pmids_aggregated AS pmids
LIMIT 100

  OR any(s IN coalesce(t.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower('Larotrectinib'))

question: Find alternative therapies targeting resistance genes for U0126 in Malignant Melanoma Of Skin Of Lower Limb.
gold_cypher:
MATCH (b:Biomarker)-[rel:AFFECTS_RESPONSE_TO]->(t1:Therapy)
WHERE (
  toLower(t1.name) = toLower('U0126')

  OR toLower(t1.name) CONTAINS toLower('U0126')
)
  AND toLower(rel.effect) = 'resistance'
  AND (
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'skin' AND
    toLower(rel.disease_name) CONTAINS 'melanoma'
  )
OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)
WITH CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
MATCH (t2:Therapy)-[r:TARGETS]->(tg:Gene)
WHERE (
  toLower(tg.symbol) = toLower(gene_symbol)
  OR any(s IN coalesce(tg.synonyms, []) WHERE toLower(s) = toLower(gene_symbol))
)
  AND toLower(t2.name) <> toLower('U0126')
RETURN
  gene_symbol,
  t2.name AS therapy_name,
  r.moa AS targets_moa,
  coalesce(r.ref_sources, []) AS ref_sources,
  coalesce(r.ref_ids, []) AS ref_ids,
  coalesce(r.ref_urls, []) AS ref_urls

    OR toLower(t.name) CONTAINS toLower('AZD8055')
)

OPTIONAL MATCH (b)-[:VARIANT_OF]->(g:Gene)

    CASE WHEN b:Gene THEN b.symbol ELSE g.symbol END AS gene_symbol,
    t.name AS therapy_name,
    rel.effect AS effect,
    rel.disease_name AS disease_name,
    coalesce(rel.pmids, []) AS pmids_raw
WHERE gene_symbol IS NOT NULL
UNWIND pmids_raw AS p
WITH gene_symbol, therapy_name, effect, disease_name, collect(DISTINCT p) AS pmids
RETURN
    NULL AS variant_name,
    gene_symbol,
    therapy_name,
    effect,
    disease_name,
    pmids
LIMIT 100
